Perfect for students, busy professionals, and seniors. 富含高浓度PS与脑部所需重要营养，全面激活记忆力、专注力与思维清晰度。结合银杏叶、DHA与乙酰左旋肉碱，促进脑部循环、维持神经活力与专注表现, 适合18岁以上的学生、上班族或长者，每天一颗，为大脑充电.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Acerpure Pro 2-in-1 Humidifier and Purifier
programme.desc: When Hazelle walks into an empty office, she discovers a full-blown flu outbreak! Find out how Hazelle uses the 2-in-1 Humidifier and Purifier to fight back against stale air, germs, and dry office conditions. 当 Hazelle 走进空荡荡的办公室时，竟发现同事们全军覆没！ 快来看 Hazelle 如何用这台二合一加湿净化机，对抗干燥空气、细菌和闷热的办公室环境.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - ErgoLuxe Ergonomic Chair v2
programme.desc: What starts as another chaotic workday turns into a full-blown chair investigation! From posture analysis to ergonomic upgrades, Zeliang's on a mission to save Hazelle (and her spine) from bad office habits. Discover how a few smart adjustments and one seriously comfy chair can make every hour at your desk feel a whole lot lighter! 今天的办公室，不只是打工日，而是一场"椅子侦查"！泽亮化身CSI专家，检查Hazelle从颈项到腰椎的"犯罪现场" 一场笑料背后，其实藏着打工人久坐的真实痛点。跟着他们一起学几招，让坐班族也能轻松舒适过每一天！

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Biowell Vital Fish Oil
programme.desc: Biowell Vital Fish Oil, contains 97% Omega-3 and adds red yeast, helping maintain the health level of the three highs. It is suitable for people who care about heart and brain health. Biowell concentrated Fish Oil, 95% concentrated fish oil. High in DHA and added with lutein. It helps improve memory, protect eyesight, and relieve dry and tired eyes. Biowell Vital Fish Oil 针对三高族群设计，含有高达97%纯度的Omega-3，并特别添加红曲，有助于维护心、血管健康、维护胆固醇、有助于稳定血压和血糖。Biowell concentrated Fish Oil, 95%高纯度浓缩鱼油；富含DHA并添加叶黄素，有助提升专注力、保护视力、缓解眼睛干涩疲劳，脑眼双补！

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - ASD Hybrid 3-ply Hex Wok 32 & 36cm
programme.desc: This cookware is made with strong stainless steel and a long-lasting non-stick coating from Whitford (USA). Its 7-layer design ensures even heat distribution and helps keep heat longer, providing great cooking results every time. Perfect for those looking for high-quality, easy-to-use kitchen tools. ASD爱仕达316不锈钢不粘炒锅采用三层钢结构与耐高温不粘涂层，结合了不锈钢的耐用与不粘锅的便捷。蜂窝纹理设计省油防粘，食材加热均匀，不怕铁铲和钢丝球刮擦，适合烹饪各种坚硬食材。

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Krafter Purple Magic Sheet
programme.desc: South Korea’s no. 1 Home Shopping product! A multi-purpose cleaning sheet that works wonders by effectively removing grease, stains, mould and odors on all surfaces! 韩国电视购物频台爆款！这万能布能有效地清理顽固的污渍， 油脂和气味！

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Gourmet Chef Thermo Blend

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Acerpure Water Purifier + Air Fryer
programme.desc: Upgrade your kitchen with the Acerpure Aqua WP5 Water Purifier and 2-in-1 Flip Air Fryer—the ultimate duo for convenience and health. Enjoy instant 99°C hot and 5°C cold water, perfectly filtered with 5-in-1 RO & double UV sterilization, while the 2-in-1 Flip Air Fryer lets you air fry, grill, or make soup with a quick 180° flip. Both are easy to use, safe, and efficient—smarter cooking and cleaner drinking water, all in one kitchen setup. 厨房必备组合：Acerpure Aqua WP5 滤净水器搭配2合1翻转气炸锅，理想组合，健康又方便。随时享用 99°C 热水 / 5°C 冷水，水质纯净安全（5合1 RO+双重UV杀菌）；翻转气炸锅可轻松实现 空气炸、烤肉、煮汤。操作简单、安全高效，干净饮水与轻松烹饪，一台搞定厨房大小事！

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - La Gourmet Flame Electric Cooker
programme.desc: La Gourmet Flame Electric Cooker This La Gourmet Flame Electric Cooker provides you with the best of both worlds by combining a hot pot and grill in one appliance. Enjoy versatile meal preparation, whether you’re simmering soups or grilling meats and vegetables! 这款La Gourmet 火焰电饭锅将火锅和烧烤炉结合一体。为您提供两全其美的享受。无论您是煮汤还是烧烤肉类和蔬菜，都能享受多功能的膳食准备！

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - OTO Anyway Back Massage Cushion
programme.desc: A lightweight 4.5 kg cushion that turns any seat into a personal massage chair. Dual rollers on a full-length track relax from neck to hips and improve circulation. Simple controls make instant relaxation easy anytime, anywhere. 仅重 4.5 公斤，轻巧便携，椅子、沙发或车里都能用，一靠即可全背按摩。双滚轮从颈肩到腰臀，舒缓肌肉、促进循环。靠垫柔软贴合、支撑力佳、透气舒适，随时轻松放松。

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Home Shopping) - Health+ Jujube Essence & Mulberry Puree
programme.desc: Health+ Jujube Essence & Mulberry Puree are crafted as pure juices with no sugar, no water, and no preservatives. Each sachet delivers natural nourishment anytime, anywhere. Jujube helps boost energy, support immunity, improve sleep, and enhance women’s wellness, while mulberry provides rich antioxidants, improves eyes health, and promotes radiant skin. Health+ 红枣原汁 + 桑葚原浆采用纯果汁制作，不加糖、不加水、无防腐剂。每一小包都能随时随地为你补充天然营养。红枣有助提升气血、增强免疫力、改善睡眠、呵护女性健康；桑葚则富含抗氧化成分，有助护眼、促进皮肤亮泽，全面提升你的状态。

programme.title: Casper the Friendly Ghost - Casper the Friendly Ghost Ep4 - EP104
programme.desc: Depressed by the antics of the other ghosts, Casper leaves home to make friends. After unintentionally scaring several potential pals, Casper befriends two young children. They take him home, where Casper frightens their mother. Casper is again upset because he believes that he will always scare away his potential buddies. However, Casper scares away a banker who is coming to foreclose on the woman's house, and this wins her heart for Casper.

programme.title: Baby Einstein - Baby's First Sounds: Discoveries for Little Ears
programme.desc: Perhaps the sweetest sounds you'll ever hear are the babbles and coos that one day become ma-ma, da-da and I love you. Besides being music to your ears, these baby steps of language change everything as your little one discovers an exciting, powerful new way of relating to the world! Baby's First Sounds invites both of you to share these memorable moments: those precious ''firsts'' that come around once in your baby's lifetime.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Habits - EP109
programme.desc: In this episode, we will discover that habits are the result of repeating good action until it becomes part of our routine. All of our activities are very important! That's why you should give a very special place for rest, for having fun, and for sharing with your friends and family. We will also learn about the importance of punctuality!

programme.title: Kidaverse Roblox Rumble - Kidaverse Roblox Rumble Ep7 - EP7

programme.title: Baby Einstein - Meet the Orchestra: First Instruments
programme.desc: At 12 months, babies can identify specific sounds, and they re also starting to match the sounds they hear with the objects that make them. programme.title: Kids' Planet - Forgiveness - EP110
programme.desc: In this episode, we will go on an expedition to the Planet of Forgiveness and learn that forgiveness is an act of love that helps us overcome anger and misunderstandings and that when we forgive we see things with more clarity. And most importantly, when we recognize our mistakes we realize the importance of asking for forgiveness through our hearts.

programme.title: Kidaverse Roblox Rumble - Kidaverse Roblox Rumble Ep8 - EP8
programme.desc: Eight kid gamers, ages eight to twelve, battle it out in ten different Roblox games to win prizes and find out who is the ultimate gamer! Video gamer, football star, and children’s book author Rashad Jennings hosts!

programme.title: Baby Einstein - Baby Bach: Musical Adventure
programme.desc: Every stage is an exciting adventure with your newborn. As babies grow, they absorb a wide variety of sights and sounds. And with so much to see and hear, infants seem to enjoy, and be most soothed by, gentle sounds such as your voice or pleasant, restful music. Treat your child -- and yourself -- to the delights of Baby Bach™ Musical Adventure, an award-winning program that exposes babies to the joy and majesty of classical music while presenting them with stimulating, colorful images.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Courage - EP111
programme.desc: In this episode, we will explore the corners of outer space where only the brave ones can reach. Curious will teach us that being brave doesn't mean being afraid, but acting in spite of fear. We will discover that courage is inside each one of us and that "determination" allows us to face our fears, while "will" pushes us to do things with passion.

programme.title: Mellodees - We Wish You a Merry Christmas - EP21
programme.desc: It’s time to open presents with Dee and friends! Who’s next

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy - Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy Ep23 - EP123
programme.desc: In a new spin-off series of mini-episodes - ‘Sunny Bunnies Get Busy’ - the characters are on hand to entertain and engage viewers in various colourful and creative activities and inspire children to 'Get Busy'.

programme.title: Giselle and the Green Team - The Case of the Nuclear Waste Conundrum - EP110
programme.desc: Gisele and her Green Team try to stop raidoactivity in the ground water.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S1 - Divided We Fall / White-Nosed Bats - EP108
programme.desc: The Rangers have to stop a poacher in Africa. / The Rangers have to save a colony of bats suffering from White Nose Disease.

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab - The Monster Not Under the Bed / Nanobots Byte - EP112
programme.desc: The Secret Lab Kids shrink themselves to microscopic proportions in order to prove to Joelle that there are no monsters hiding under her bed. They just didn’t count on all the other microscopic creatures. / When Angie's garbage-eating nanobytes escape from the lab, the Secret Lab Kids must stop them before they turn the planet into one giant feeding ground.

programme.title: Secret Millionaires Club - When Pigs Fly - EP103
programme.desc: When Elena has to raise a potbellied pig for school, she can't do anything right and considers herself to be a failure.

programme.title: Superhero Kindergarten - Hall of Fame - EP117
programme.desc: When Captain Fantastic is inducted into the Super Hero Hall of Fame, Nigel Danforth decides to do everything he can to disrupt the main event.

programme.title: Yeti Tales
programme.desc: Join Us in Yeti Tales !

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Misha, the Purple Cat
programme.desc: Misha is a very lively, alert cat. She is very interested in investigating everything going on around her, which means she has some very entertaining adventures with her friends. Many things can happen in Misha’s world; especially exciting adventures, mysterious investigations, hilarious competitions... all with a feeling of close friendship.

programme.desc: In a dystopian society where humans must run every day to generate electricity, an 18-year-old girl begins to wonder about the true purpose of being alive.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 1
programme.desc: When a bank adviser is found dead, fears of terrorist attacks drives Secret Service Officer Tarkan to ask the police for help. Inspector Mehmet Özakin is sent to work with him to investigate a case laced with corruption, blackmail, and illegal trafficking.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.title: The Traveller: The Valley of Fear
programme.desc: In the Basque Country, Captain Yann Kandinsky investigates the disappearance of a young bookseller whose case mirrors a murder from twenty years earlier. All evidence points to the same man—Yves Cesnoz, convicted of the first crime—but Kandinsky believes the real killer is still at large.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: Three Quarter Moon
programme.desc: Hartmut, a taxi-driver, is left in a bitter slump when his wife leaves him. That is, until he gets six-year-old Hayat and her mother in his taxi. In a serendipitous turn of events, Hayat is left under his care and she helps him learn to enjoy life again.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 2
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet Özakinb narrowly survives a bomb blast in a café thanks to the intervention of his colleague Mustafa. With two key figures in the current case dead from the blast, and the official narrative not adding up, Mehmet suspects foul play.

programme.title: The Cave Of The Yellow Dog
programme.desc: Nansal, a Mongolian nomadic girl finds a puppy and brings it home but her father believes it to be bad luck. But when the dog saves the family’s baby, he finally accepts it. Central to this tale is the belief in the cycle of rebirth between man and dog.

programme.title: A Childhood
programme.desc: As summer drags by, 13-year-old Jimmy, forced by circumstance to become an adult too soon, runs up against the limits of his small hometown and his turbulent life, caught between a mother on the slide and a stepfather who keeps her down.
